column4: Hi everyone I just upgraded to Ubuntu 10.04 and my work place windows are gone any help please?
I just upgraded to Ubuntu 10.04 and my work place windows are gone any help please?
right click on your panel. select add to panel. look for workspace switcher
then fiddle the prefrences to your liking
i mean just the thing that lists what apps you have open.
by default its on the top and bottom.
panel info upon rt click no switcher to be seen?
in the add to panel window there's no workspace switcher?
and when I minimize a window it's gone from view?
it sounds like your panel gor borked. you might want to add Window list as well (then minimize will work)
Borked indeed That worked just fine can see all. now .thanks a BUNCH!
